short_summary: Senior Technical Writer Services for DMMS(MIS) in Support of Halifax Class Design Agent (HCDAg) Integrated Data Environment (IDE) Project
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Senior Technical Writer to support the Halifax Class Design Agent (HCDAg) Integrated Data Environment (IDE) Project. The Technical Writer will provide services to assist the Technical Authority with the development of S1000D policy to support the development of the HC DAg IDE. Required skills include level 3 technical writing experience, familiarity with S1000D policy, and experience with supporting large data environments.

full_summary:
**Senior Technical Writer Services in Support of DMMS (MIS)**

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Bid  
**Notice Reference:** PW-22-01015204  
**Publication Date:** November 29, 2022  
**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Contracting Authority:**
Department of National Defence  
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2  
E-mail: [DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca](mailto:DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca)  
[Phone: (insert contact information)]  
[Fax: ______________]

**Description of Services:**
The Department of National Defence requires a Senior Technical Writer to support the Directorate of Maritime Management and Support – Management Information System (DMMS (MIS)). The successful bidder will assist the Technical Authority in developing S1000D policy to support the development of the Halifax Class Design Agent Integrated Data Environment (IDE) project.

**Security Clearance:**
The successful bidder must possess a minimum Security Clearance of SECRET. Resource personnel must also have a minimum Security Clearance of SECRET.

**Trade Agreements:**
The contract is covered under the following trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

**Level of Effort:**
The estimated level of effort is 540 days for the initial contract period, with an additional 240 days for each of the three one-year option periods.

**Contract Term:**
The contract term will be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2025, followed by three one-year option periods.

**Submission Requirements:**
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. These documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.
